data.body: Repro: bash scripts/test-doctor-stream.sh --fix. After questionnaire, suggested fixes are not applied. Need local development path that tests updated doctor logic without changing installed production foolery binary or server.

data.title: doctor --fix questionnaire answers are not applying fixes in stream test
